name: Planes Missiles - Go Simulator
description:
All the best action game with planes . In this sky fighting game there are bullet attacks & escape is fun action game with air planes.
Be swift and try to explode as much fires as you can without being damaged. Try to attack on the
opponent planes before you are attacked. You have extra 5 missiles which can be used for player plane protection.
You have 5 mine bombs to cover the blast area whenever the enemy plane arrive in that area enemy plane blast.
You try the fires approach without touching you and damage the opponents plane as many as possible to win points.
